data.title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
data.description: A traditional Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and pancetta
data.instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti in salted water. 2. Fry pancetta until crispy. 3. Mix eggs with cheese. 4. Combine hot pasta with pancetta. 5. Add egg mixture off heat. 6. Serve immediately.

data.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
data.description: Fresh salad with grilled chicken, croutons, and Caesar dressing
data.instructions: 1. Grill chicken until cooked through. 2. Chop lettuce. 3. Slice chicken. 4. Combine all ingredients. 5. Toss with dressing.
